Tired of tab overload and slowed browser?  
Use Single Tab Organizer to close all the open tabs in a single list enabling smooth tab management saving a lot of useful memory space.

It allows-
1. Instant Tab Management: Manage all your open tabs with a single click and access them anytime, all from one organized list.
2. Memory Saver: Reduce memory usage as it closes all opened tabs and saves them in a single list efficiently, freeing up valuable resources.
3. Easy Restoration: Reopen saved tabs individually or all at once, keeping your browsing seamless and efficient.
4. Clean Interface: Enjoy a sleek, user-friendly design that keeps your tab management effortless and intuitive.
